questions.question: What is the exact name of the feature or module this guide covers?
questions.description: Used in the document header and overview to identify the specific feature

questions.question: What is the name of the product that contains this feature?
questions.description: Ensures users know which product the guide belongs to

questions.question: What is your company name?
questions.description: Provides branding context in the document overview

questions.question: Who is the primary audience for this guide?
questions.description: Determines the tone and depth of instructions

questions.question: What version number should this guide carry?
questions.description: Used for version control and change tracking

questions.question: When does this guide become effective?
questions.description: Shows users the guide’s validity period

questions.question: When was this guide last reviewed?
questions.description: Helps users assess currency of the content

questions.question: Who is the approver or sign-off authority for this guide?
questions.description: Establishes accountability and governance

questions.question: List the specific functionalities covered in this guide (one per line).
questions.placeholder:
e.g., Creating reports
Scheduling automated exports
Sharing dashboards
questions.description: Defines the boundaries of the guide

questions.question: List any related items explicitly NOT covered (one per line).
questions.placeholder:
e.g., API integration
Custom scripting
Legacy widget migration
questions.description: Prevents user confusion about what’s outside scope

questions.question: Provide a concise description of the feature.
questions.placeholder: e.g., The Advanced Reporting Dashboard allows users to create, customize, and share interactive data visualizations.
questions.description: Sets user expectations

questions.question: List the top 3–5 outcomes users will achieve (one per line).
questions.placeholder:
e.g., Reduce report creation time by 50%
Enable self-service analytics
Improve data-driven decisions
questions.description: Motivates users to read and follow the guide

questions.question: When should users use this feature? (bullet-style, one scenario per line)
questions.placeholder:
e.g., Monthly executive reviews
Quarterly KPI tracking
Ad-hoc customer insights
questions.description: Clarifies ideal usage contexts

questions.question: Which user roles will use this feature?
questions.description: Determines role-specific instructions

questions.question: What is the expected experience level of the primary audience?
questions.description: Sets the technical depth of the guide

questions.question: List the primary objectives users want to achieve (one per line).
questions.placeholder:
e.g., Generate compliance reports quickly
Share insights with stakeholders
Automate recurring dashboards
questions.description: Aligns guide content with user goals

questions.question: List common issues users encounter (one per line).
questions.placeholder:
e.g., Report fails to load
Charts display incorrect data
Export button is grayed out
questions.description: Populates the troubleshooting table

questions.question: For each issue above, provide the likely cause (same order, one per line).
questions.placeholder:
e.g., Browser cache conflict
Incorrect filter selection
Missing export permissions
questions.description: Helps users self-diagnose problems

questions.question: For each cause above, provide the recommended fix (same order, one per line).
questions.placeholder:
e.g., Clear browser cache and reload
Verify filter settings
Contact admin to grant export role
questions.description: Enables quick resolution without support

questions.question: Which internal metrics will you track for this guide?
questions.description: Determines which metrics appear in the governance table

questions.question: For each selected metric, state its purpose (same order, one per line).
questions.placeholder:
e.g., Measure popularity
Gauge instruction clarity
Identify documentation gaps
questions.description: Clarifies why each metric matters
